title: Software Development Engineer, AWS
description: Build scalable, high-performance, and reliable services for Amazon Web Services (AWS).
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent
3+ years of experience in software development
Proficiency in Java, C++, or Python
responsibilities: Design, develop, and deploy distributed systems
Participate in on-call rotations for service support

title: Senior Product Manager, Alexa
description: Lead the product lifecycle for new Alexa features and devices.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in a technical field
Experience with voice technology or consumer electronics
responsibilities: Work with engineering and design to deliver products
Analyze market trends and customer needs

title: Data Engineer, Retail
description: Design, build, and maintain scalable data pipelines for Amazon's retail business.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
3+ years of experience in data engineering
Proficiency in SQL and experience with ETL tools
responsibilities: Collaborate with data scientists and analysts

title: Solutions Architect, Enterprise
description: Help enterprise customers design and implement scalable, secure, and cost-effective solutions on AWS.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent
7+ years of experience in IT architecture or consulting
responsibilities: Develop technical strategies for cloud adoption

title: Applied Scientist, Computer Vision
description: Research and develop cutting-edge computer vision algorithms for various Amazon products.
requirements: PhD in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or related field
3+ years of experience in computer vision research
Proficiency in Python and deep learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch)
